[60FPS (Hold R button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 10000000
26E62070 00000001
DD000000 00000100
26E62070 00000002
D0000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[++FPS++]

[Default 60FPS]
D3000000 10000000
26E62070 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[30FPS]
D3000000 10000000
26E62070 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[--]
